document_data.name: High House of Magic
document_data.mainbody:
The '''High House of Magic''' was the [[guildhall]] of the [[Wizards Guild]] of [[Ravens Bluff]] in [[the Vast]]. 

It was a large, needle-spired castle-like structure with small bolts of crackling purple lightning washing over the walls.{{Cite digital book/Prince of Ravens/Kindle|1724|6}} The building hosted a large library and had enchanted busts of former archmages in the entryway.{{Cite digital book/Prince of Ravens/Kindle|1733|6}}
